page.title: 17ATTITUDES OF AN OAP
page.content: Sid used to be a caretaker at a school called Richard Lee.He has a good sense of humour and likes to play snooker. He likes going to town.He is getting a petition together about there being no buses on Sundays.There is an easy ride bus to take them to Redditch once a month. Sid lives in an old age people's home.He likes the home and he likes the other people in it.He likes wildlife and he often goes into town to do some shopping.He likes the school being next to his home.He has many friends in his block. Sid has lived in the area for 29 years.He likes the Wyken area.He does not like vandalism and would phone the Police about it.He thinks there should be more jobs in the area.He knows a little bit about the history of Wyken, about the monks and the Pippen apple.
